Fake / Customer Service Smile.prompt: forced fake smile, cold eyes, dead stare behind a smile, insincere expression, tense facial muscles

Schadenfreude.prompt: wicked smirk, malicious joy, gloating expression, eyes sparkling with cruelty, watching someone fail

Disdainful Boredom.prompt: haughty expression, heavy-lidded eyes, looking down nose, unimpressed, arrogant yawn, judging

Suppressed Laughter.prompt: biting lip to stop laughing, puffed cheeks, twinkling eyes, trembling lips from hidden joy

Adrenaline Surge.prompt: wide-eyed manic intensity, flared nostrils, bared teeth, fierce combat expression, wild gaze

Battle Fatigue / Wounded.prompt: exhausted expression, glazed eyes, dirt and sweat on face, grimacing in pain, heavy breathing, slumped features

Berserker Rage.prompt: veins popping in forehead, screaming, bloodshot eyes, uncontrollable fury, aggressive jaw, bared teeth

Grimacing in Pain.prompt: tightly shut eyes, bared teeth, facial distortion from physical agony, tensed neck muscles

Predatory Hunger.prompt: hungry gaze, focused stalking expression, dilated pupils, subtle tongue on lip, dangerous intensity, lethal look

Mind-Controlled / Vacant.prompt: vacant stare, thousand-yard stare, puppet-like expression, unresponsive eyes, slack jaw, eerily calm

Possessed / Sinister.prompt: unnatural smile, rolled back eyes, shadowed face, malicious grin, unsettling facial symmetry

Hollow-Eyed / Shell-Shocked.prompt: traumatized expression, sunken eyes, pale face, emotionally dead, haunted look

Seductive Bedroom Eyes.prompt: heavy-lidded eyes, bedroom eyes, half-closed gaze, alluring look, intense sexual tension

Ahegao / Peak Euphoria.prompt: overwhelmed expression, crossed eyes, tongue out, intense pleasure, ecstatic look, flushed face

Lustful Anticipation.prompt: biting lower lip, dilated pupils, heavy breathing expression, flushed cheeks, intense desire

Submissive / Obedient.prompt: downcast eyes, blushing, slight pout, vulnerable expression, waiting for command

Dominant / Predatory Smirk.prompt: dark smirk, command in the eyes, predatory gaze, superior posture, intense eye contact

Euphoric Trance.prompt: eyes rolled back, open mouth, head tilted back, expression of pure overwhelming pleasure

Biting Lip / Flirty.prompt: biting lower lip, flirty intensity, focused gaze, subtle blushing, anticipation

Suppressed Tears.prompt: glassy teary eyes, trembling chin, looking away, holding back a sob, emotional tension

Betrayed / Heartbroken.prompt: shattered expression, trembling lips, wide shocked eyes, face falling, disbelief

Stoic / Cold.prompt: emotionless face, cold gaze, robotic, unreadable features, clinical detachment

Calculating / Scheming.prompt: narrowed eyes, subtle smirk, calculating gaze, focused thinking, plotting expression

Inquisitive / Skeptical.prompt: one raised eyebrow, narrowed eyes, head tilted, judgmental look, questioning everything
